content.detailedDescription: I'm not sure what the flying object in the picture is, but at the time of taking the picture, i saw nothing noticeable in the sky. i only discovered this after looking closely at the picture on my computer.
content.summary: I discovered this flying object in my picture recently. i'm not sure what it is, but thought i would submit it.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband went to bed early that night about 9:30 pm and i decided to stay up and watch tv.  around 10:30 pm or so i kept hearing a very unusual sound.  intially, i thought it was perhaps an airplane flying over the house..Which isn't unusual.  however, i noticed that the sound was very different and it didn't come and go..And fade out like a normal airplane would do as when one would normally approach and fly over.   it was a very constant hovering humming type of sound, like it was right overhead.  trust me, it wasn't an airplane or a helicopter..I can recognize these quite easily.  it sounded like a huge generator or like a jet does when it is sitting still at the airport.   i kept thinking, it can't be a plane, it would have faded out by now and the sound was quite different.  so, i muted the tv and sat and listened, i went to the front window, saw nothing, went to the rear of the house and looked out the back window, saw nothing.  so, i decided to go outside.  i walked down the walk to the house because i couldn't figure out this odd noise, the wind was blowing the trees and i was looking around to see if i could see anything, but i didn't.  i was just looking towards the front skies.  the sound was so different and constant.   i walked down the drive and suddenly the noise just very quickly shut off.  it was weird, like someone flicked a switch.  all of a sudden all the trees and air became very still and the winds stopped and i got chills up the back of my neck and just knew something was going on..Very strange.  i just ran into the house screaming for my husband, i woke him up but he wouldn't get out of bed.  he thought i was crazy and told me to go to bed.  i went back out into the den and looked out the window again and the wind was blowing again...And the noise started again, but this time only lasted a minute or so and it was gone.  remember, i never saw a thing, it was the sounds that i heard..But i really didn't look all around..Just towards the north.  it didn't dawn on me until later that it could have been an ufo.  

my husband doesn't want me saying anything to anyone, but i can't help but write this letter to you, because deep down inside me, i know something very strange and unusual happened that night.  he doesn't want people showing up at the house.  

has this type of incident every been reported before?

i am a little concerned over giving out my address to third parties.  my phone number and email would be ok.
content.summary: Humming noise like a generator or jet running...Very constant, like it was hovering overhead but i couldn't see anything. it was a cloudy night.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north into chama new mexico i noticed chemtrails in the area of dulce new mexico at 9:15am.  dulce new mexico is world famous for the ufo base (rumored) and attracts many people to this area.  it is apparent that chemtrails are put in place so people cannot see what is flying above them, around them, etc.  i understood that chemtrails were put in place to make people sick.  from the looks of this i am beginning to suspect that chemtrails are also used to keep people from seeing what is above them such as ufo crafts and also the possiblity of planet x.  dulce new mexico is a tiny town and there is no reason for the government to spend thousand of dollars to make a few hundred people sick.  the government/alien agenda is covering up the sky in that area for obvious reasons.
content.summary: Chemtrails in dulce, new mexico area.

content.detailedDescription:
When i first seen this thing it was like a chinese lantern and thats what i thought it was until the light on it went out and a red led/strobe light flashed on and off for a couple of minutes the light then came back on and moved in a zigzag style motion and seemed to move towards a plane that was in a higher orbit before the light came back on and it moved off in the direction of barlborough/m1 services shortly followed by the police helicopter from the killamarsh direction from our house which then tracked up and down barlborough for about 10 minutes before disappearing in the sheffield/rotherham direction or m1 northbound also seen some shooting stars but seems we are in the middle of a metoer shower at the moment 

no sound from the object and it was'nt very high in the night sky. other aircaft visible with the lights that flash from an aircraft ie green red and white strobe lights no cloud coverage stars easily observed

my girlfriend and her son also observed this object with me
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo lights went out red strobing light zigzag intelligent movement

content.detailedDescription:
I was messing around testing 30 and 15 second exposure shots on my digital camera one night during a full moon. once i finished i looked at the pictures on screen and i noticed a strange light that had a consistent shape throughout 6 photos i took. didnt see anything in the sky with naked eye previously while taking the shots.

i took the 6 images and digitally adjusted the values to create a bit of contrast as to see the shape and light better.
im sure this is a  fullmoon + weird lens reflection thing. probably nothing....But i'd like to see if someone could give their opinion just incase.  

2 photos i managed to get clean and the other 4 are blurred ( can see by double wire, i probably moved the camera slightly during exposure) 

feel free to request info or ask any questions if need.

your thoughts would be appreciated.
sincerely - jeremy taylor
content.summary: Caught strange lights on digital camera.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i witnessed what we believe to be a sighting we could not explain. we live in purvis, ms. on january 22, 2010 around 6:30 p.M. we were outside in the driveway cleaning out a car we were selling. i was on the phone at the time talking to the guy buying the car. he was on the road between laurel and meridian ms. while talking to him, i turned facing north because i saw what i thought was a very bright star in the sky. i pointed it out to my wife and we both noticed it moving in a south east direction. our first thought was an airplane, so we didn't think much of it. as it got closer, it looked as if it was flying really low for an airplane. we couldn't see any of the normal blue and red lights on it, which of course got both of us wondering what it was. i started talking about it to the guy on the phone. he said he had also seen it from his location not more than 5 minutes ago. we watched it as it passed over us thinking it might be a helicopter, but it had no sound at all coming from it. as it got a little past us it blinked from a white light to a red light that lasted for maybe two seconds and then disappeared. we have asked a couple of people if they were aware of any night missions in the area that night, but nobody from our location knows of anything. we are both in the military stationed here at camp shelby, ms. i just wanted to see if anybody has any info about this. i have never seen a ufo and i don't think this was extraterrestrial. it's just something i can't explain. 

1. outside my home cleaning out a car.
2. it looked like a bright star that was not normal for that area.
3. a star/planet
4. bright white light traveling southeast. it turned red before it disappeared.
5. not sure what i just witnessed.
6. it disappeared.
content.summary: Bright white light that faded to red and disappeared.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was outside and my fiancee was in the car looking at the sky through the sunroof.  she noticed that some airplanes had left contrails that resembled a pentagram in the sky and told me to look up at it.  that is when we noticed a bright, orange light traveling from the northeast towards the southwest.  it did not appear to be an airplane and was, in my opinion, traveling much too fast to be a weather baloon.  the object remained at a constant brightness the entire time.  it traveled straight across the sky and did not seem to change direction.  the sky was clear with the exception of a few clouds.  it appeared to be traveling below the clouds when we first saw it as the clouds were behind the object.  we watched it for about three minutes as it traveled across the sky.  then it appeared to be traveling above the clouds as the clouds were now below the object.  we continued to watch for the object but did not see it again after if traveled above the cloud.  we felt a little aprehensive while watching it because we did not know what it was and could not rationally explain it.  we considered that it may have been an airplane reflecting the sunlight off of it but it was much to bright and perfectly round (no wings).
content.summary: Albuquerque bright, orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: I know about auto-kinesis(stars/planets are not ufo's) and other common ufo explainations. this was unlike any stereo typical unidentified craft. i couldnt see the dark/obscured circle in the middle. it seemed like it was flying using the glowing cylinders of light that were several times larger than the dark caft in the middle. the largest thing about the craft/object was the two wing-like cylinders of bright yellow/white light(this was at 8:30am the lights were brighter than the suns light). the sun was at about 35-45 degrees in the opposite direction,just starting to be seen over the trees. i was driving south down oak grove road rd. north of howell michigan. i was between marr rd and barron rd. i looked south west over the field between marr&barron. something brighter than the days light & white snow around me drew my attention upward over the field.  i will draw  a pictures using my key-board now oooo()oooo. imagine the o's are one complete cylinder of bright light. while the ()'s are the dark/obscured middle craft. it was a circle flying on wings of light basically. also the whole craft was connected as one entire craft. i know what you are thinking the picture oooo()oooo looks like a plane with wings and fuselage. with faa lights under its wings. except there was no wings at all or sound( it was very close,less than mile). and the lights where several times larger than a whole 747 passenger jets wings. the lights where yellow/white and solid, two giant long cylinders of solid light. no flahing or anything. also the conditions where clear(not a single cloud) and sunny. i cant think of a single light that would ever be that bright,with the sun as high and clear as it was. the light actually made me look up toward it immediately. with white snow on the ground and sun up,nothing shoulda given off enough light to draw ones eye to it suddenly. i saw the object for maybe 30 or more seconds before my line of view was blocked by tree's for less than 10 seconds. when i reached the next field i shoulda been able to see it over. it was gone completely. maybe the 1st angle i had seen it at was the only one it could be seen in,somehow. because not even the local mediflight helicopter could descended or flown away with such speed. i am so angry with myself for not pulling over immediately and taking pics,i was pressed for time. going to work. i live close to the local airport and know the sights and sounds of all the local air-craft. this object was much too large to even land at our local airport(small jets only). so there is no reason for any large aircraft to be flying that low in this area. it was about at close to the same angle of the sun(35-45*),except instead of south east it was south west. it wasnt higher than 2000-3000 feet,like a helicopter comming in for descent. i didnt witness the craft move at all. i had a passenger who also witnessed the object. i have never seen anybody else ever either take pics or draw a ufo that looked even remotely similar. also the ends of the "light cylinders" looked symetrically curved like and oval or the letter o. like something invisible was holding/containing the light. also i shoulda been able to hear a fixed wing prop/jet plane and helicopter that close. no sounds at all. the object beween the two cylinders of light was dark/shadowed. it was the shape of a perfect circle. maybe the color itself was black or very dark? no other shapes of features could be pulled of it. just the two light cylinder,enclosing the circle craft between them.
content.summary: A dark circle craft in the middle of two oval/cylinder of white yellow light hovering very low, no sound/not helicopter. it seemed to be flying on bright wings of light,bright enough to be seen as glowing in the morning sunlight.

content.detailedDescription:
My roommate and i were watching tv, a very bright light flash appeared and the power went off, this happened three times consecutively, then the power was off for good.  after calling the power company, i went to bed.  i awoke sitting up in bed unable to move.  my roommate also reported waking up in a sitting position.  she got up, turned off the lights (power apparently came back on at some point) and went back to bed.  she reported hearing my phone ring, which was near my bed, i did not hear it at all (?)  this was sometime after 12:20am.  i did not see anything outside, but across the lake, which is behind my house, i could see neighbor's lights on.  
when the flashes of light happened, somehow, we could both feel something through our feet.  (that was strange)  the feeling was like a very fast vibration, like a "tickle".  the flashes seemed like they were extremely close to the house, i only have one neighbor, on the west side of my property, the flashes happened on the east side of my home.
i have no idea if my neighbors were effected.
content.summary: Three bright flashes, then loss of power

content.detailedDescription: This sighting last night was only the most recent of my experiances. i have seen many objects over the past few months in the skys over my neighborhood in massapequa,ny. last night my friend tom and i were in his car, parked on a side street around the block from plainedge high school. we were bored and having a conversation and a bright ligh cought my eye in the passenger side mirror. i looked at it throught the mirror for a second and realized that it was not a car head light or a light on someones house. i turned around in the car and told tom and he also started watching. it was headed for us comming from our "6" as a pilot would say, i'd say mabey a few 100 feet in altitude. when we both confirmed with each other that this was strange we both got out of the car. this is where i'm looking for answers, the object started to bank toward the left, mind you very gracefully and silently, note how i stress the silent because as a young man who watches alot of military channel and discovery channel, and i've been to a couple air shows here on li, i've never seen something fly silently other than a glider. all of the objects i've seen in recent months are silent and it's starting to really scare me. so when it banked the 1 light turned to 3 not a v form but more of a triangle. the object kept pretty strait after the initial bank turn or i'd estimate about 20 degrees or so. the is a fair amount of ground light in the area we were but there was no real outline of the object othere than the lights and it had to be colored black and it definatly didn't have a traditional tail like most planes. i didn't take my eye off the object until it was unviewable due to tree cover, we were parked facing north and the object appeared in the south and went out of view in the north northweast. i don't think this was a traitonal aircraft unless i can be proved otherwise, i'm always open for a feasable and resonable explanation and that is why i'm contacting you. if these things i've been seeing lately aren't alien space craft then what are they. i will tell you that my neighborhood and long island in general is having a heroin epidemic, could these be dea stealths or something i am trying to be open minded but my father said that that's crazier than thinking it's aliens. i don't know what to think anymore all i want is a reply and i invite you to let me discribe in person what i'm seeing, i'm seriously thinking about buying nightvision camcorder because too many people think i'm nuts because everyone is so nieve and never allows themself to think out side the box. it's been a weekly or even multiple time a week thing for me that's why i'm starting to get scared, your help would be appreciated.  -mike from massapequa,ny
content.summary: Strange variety of silent "aircraft" over the massapequa area.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving on robert moses causeway back from the beaches and we saw an airplane fly over head. we watched it fly into the distance and then it kind of just stopped in mid air hovering there or somrthing. then we looiked east and there was another..Then north and another. they all flew in a triagular shape with eachother. they did not dissapear for well over ten minutes.
content.summary: Looks like an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was on my way home from basketball i looked out the window to see these four large lights. there were four other people in the car with me i informed one of my friends of sighting. he looked out his window and saw the ufo also. my feelings toward the sighting was shock and a happy feeling.
i lost sight of the object when it sped up and vanished into nothing.


if any one has heard or seen any thing about this ufo contact me at 

(blaisebb@hotmail.Com)
content.summary: Fast moving, four lights forming into one the vanishing.

content.detailedDescription:
In the month of september in 1990,i am home with my 2 children,ages 4 and 15.Was cooking a pizza in the oven around 7:00pm that night,i went outside to have a cigarette and tea.I noticed lights in the back of our woods,that were bright and circular,and were moving around very slow.Zig zaging maneuvers.I became scared and yelled through the backdoor for my daughter to get the baby.The power flickered on and off and then went completely off.My daughter arrived with the child wrapped in a blanket and handed him to me.The power is still off and we are standing at the back step.And that moment a larger craft appears on the edge of our land line.I told my daughter to take the child and hide upstairs.The smaller white balls changed colors from white to yellow  as i was watching and it met the larger craft.(the larger craft was gigantic,and resembled a huge saucer with yellow lights)then i got angry with what i was seeing and i went into the woods to challenge what i was seeing,and i lost all of my memory after this,and i'm am having a hard time discerning the truth from the actual event.To my knowledge is the truth.I vaguely remember the rest of the event but to my knowledge i was able to make it back to the house,i was very tired and i remember making a phone to the rcmp to come and investigate.And i remember now that my head was in severe pain.I then went to check on the children and they were resting peacefully in my daughters bed.Then i moved the children to my room because i was scared and didn't know what was going on or what was happening.I rested with them until the rcmp arrived at around 9:30 pm that night.I gave them my report and they we're going to keep a surveillance on the house for the remainder of the night.Because i was so distraught from what i witnessed and experienced.The rcmp came with a camera and took pictures of the area where i made the sighting.The rcmp told me they believed my story so they did a perimeter check but did not enter the woods.They took pictures of the surrounding area but found nothing.Then tea and coffee we're offered to them and we conversed about the event.It seemed as though they believed me.While the rcmp were there the lights flickered on and off again.But the power was kept.And then they suggested an electrical problem.Then the rcmp returned to their vehicle,wrote up a report and left.At that moment i locked all doors and windows,took in the dog and cats and went to bed for the rest of the night.Which was around 10:30 pm that night.And that night was very quiet and nothing to my knowledge happened after that.And when i woke up and i was feeling strangely happy not knowing why.That is my story
thank you
this is all true and happened in the fall of 1990 in eastern canada.Nova scotia,cape breton.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Small circular balls appear;power is lost;larger mothership appears behind cloud;power is returned;rcmp are called;lost memory

content.detailedDescription: Followed me home from approximately 3 miles. it maintained the same distance from me the whole time. could not make out shape, but it had several colors. it seemed to fluctuate its colors as if it was rotating... it stayed suspended near my home for about an hour before it very slowly lowered behind the treeline.
content.summary: Several flashing lights, followed me home and maintained same distance

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside in the evening around 9:00pm on febuary 20th 2009 and had a 10 000 000 000 lumen spotlight in my hand and was waving it into the sky and switchin it on and off for no apparent reason.And on the eastern side of the sky where i was waving the light an object which first resembled a shooting star came into view then it dissapeared and reappeared right above me and stopped;i then knew it was a ufo because i never seen anything so orange in my life.Started to pulsate a bright orange and slowly moved along the land line and then it just turned itself off.I tried to get it to turn itself back on by waving the light back on and off,and nothing so i turned the light off.Then i yelled into te air "you not kidnapping me you evil reptile bastards".And to my amazment i felt as if it really heard me.Then while i was heading back into the house the object reappeared for a second and moved at the same speed it came into view then dissapeared.It went over the tree lines at incredible speed and i lost sight of it.
afterwards i felt as if i was being monitored or as if someone was in the room with me for the remainder of that night.But i started reading the bible and prayed.And nothing happen out of the ordinary after that.

no photos sorry.
content.summary: Very big very orange object

content.detailedDescription: At 8:30 i watched three object move , the first was a small star like, them a white one, then a yellow, with red bottom, the last one moved really fast and vanished. at l:00 i was looking at the moon, and a saw a bright white light move, i counted as it moved exactly 22 to 25 on and off lights. then it dissappeared. this light was rooftop level. i was awake but not, i was in a cloudy feeling.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw three small orbs move, then later in the night i saw abright white bleeping light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking along quernmore road when something caught my eye i looked up to my right when i saw a bright round orange coloured light moving very fast.
it must have been at least over 1000 ft in the sky,it moved and curved slightly again it was moving very fast then it just dissapeard in the sky.
it was a clear sky night and for it to just dissapear like that it was surreal i have never seen anything move and look like that in my whole life.
i have managed to record the footage on my cell phone, the qualitiy is fairly poor but you can see the light and how fast it is moving it was such a strange experience that i felt kind of weird afterwards.
im now wanting to investigate this even more i wnt to know were i can find out what aircrafts were in the skys across lancaster any advice and help on this will be much appreciated.
                                many thanks
                               sean robinson
content.summary: Bright orange ball moving very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my son to school, and had seen it 3 days in a row, then it was gone on the 4th. very strange. i decided to take a pic of it with my phone. it was daylight.
content.summary: White orb, low in the sky and very brite.

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed one at first, then another came from nowhere and flashed red lights to the other one, it really lit the sky red. a short time later there were more, about 10. they seemed to have a formation 3 in the middle one on top of the other, with 2 on each side. there were more but not in formation. they have been in the same place everynight, since november of 2009. they appear to have alot of color, red, blue, green, gold, and purple. i don't know of any plane that flashes all these colors.
i'm sure you can see them, they are very bright!
content.summary: Strange lights in the sky, looks like cop cars in the sky, about 10

content.detailedDescription: I noticed one at first, then another came from nowhere and flashed red lights to the other one, it really lit the sky red. a short time later there were more, about 10. they seemed to have a formation 3 in the middle one on top of the other, with 2 on each side. there were more but not in formation. they have been in the same place everynight, since november of 2009. they appear to have alot of color, red, blue, green, gold, and purple. i don't know of any plane that flashes all these colors.
content.summary: Strange lights in the sky, looks like cop cars in the sky, about 10

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cigarette and noticed bright lights in the sky coming towards me. i thought they were too bright for a plane and wondered why a plane would be flying this far from the city as we are in the countryside surrounded by hills. i continued to watch it and all of a sudden it changed direction in a 90 degree angle. as it seemed quite low i was listening for sound but heard absolutely nothing and it is a very quiet still night. i noticed also that the lights got no dimmer as it changed direction and seemed to be the same brightness all around it. i then watched it travel very rapidly over the hills still very bright. i saw this from front, side, and the back and the lights stayed the same brightness at all angles.
 the moon was full and bright and situated in the northeasterly direction.
the lights on the object were brighter than the stars and it was not a reflection of the moon as the lights on the object were too bright.

i was in a bit of shock after i witnessed the whole event. i then called my husband out after the event, as while i was watching the object i didn't want to move or make a sound. i was in awe as to what i had just seen and described the whole thing to my husband and we went through a list of things it could have been ie.. plane , helicopter, space debris, satellites but none of those applied as there was no noise and too low in the sky for satellites or space debris.  we both feel i just witnessed a ufo sighting.
content.summary: Bright lights in sky from south suddenly changed direction heading east  low in sky but no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Hi peoples.

back in 2008 i was experimenting with a camera connected to my pc running some security software. when checking the previous nights footage i was surprised and a little scared to find it had recorded some strange beams.


there are several very unusual things of note. the first beam in the video looks to be going straight through a concrete tiled porch roof. 
it is also interesting to see that the beams did not illuminate the area whatsoever. 

the area is not well lit as it is only illuminated by 4 infrared led's mounted on the b&w camera.

please note the time jumps as the software is only set to record movement. the red lines make a box that the software is set to exclude movement such as plants.

i have included a still daytime image to give a better idea of the area. at the top corner is part of the roof structure.

comments are very much welcome. i am at a loss as to what it was.. any ideas?????
content.summary: Strange searchlight recorded by home security camera

content.detailedDescription: Seem to be connected kinda like a helicopter, no noise though, but 3 orange lights. it woke me up because there was orange light in my backyard and i was sleeping on the couch in living room. hovered over my backyard for a minute then disappeared.
content.summary: 3 orange lights

content.detailedDescription: Was looking south in back yard, saw something out of corner of eye.  as i looked west, saw a bluish-white light streak from high in sky toward the west.  it only lasted a few seconds before it disappeared from view, behind the house next to ours.  at first i though it was a shooting star, but the skies are overcast, so it had to be low enough to be passing through clouds.  when it happened, i actually thought that it was going to hit the ground far off and i waited for an explosion or rumble, but never heard anything.
content.summary: Bright bluish-white circle of light streaked toward west and looked like it would crash into ground

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to let dogs out looked up at moon saw a bright glowing object came back inside house got iphone video taped a object making turns and moves conventional fixed wing aircraft could not do these manuvers i have two clips on tape in my phone not sure how to send it to you the object was high altitude( not sure )how high  south into york county
i beleive the video is time stamped my wife who is skeptacle well educated can't explain this
i had difficulty sleeping
sincerely,

dean teeter
content.summary: Bright white red to green unexplainable object in sky
content.locationName: I live in boro camphill, Pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription: Why, still, in this day are people going crazy over black triangle aircraft, when it's well know that hydrogen filled black triangle shaped aircraft are being used by governments around the world. look them up on you internet. just put in black triangle aircraft and click on. so, why report them? it's like getting excited and reporting an a-10 warthog.
content.summary: A non-event

content.detailedDescription:
Photo taken with canon 5d mark ii with canon 35-350mm "l" lens tv/av = 30/5.6 canon ae iso 200

time and data are correct at my location.  

the sky was exceptionally clear even for buena vista, co.  elevation at my home is 9,300 feet.  

when leaving for the store i noticed this unusual size "star" with a nice mag but thought nothing of it.  however, considering the brightness of the moon i took a second look through the lens of the camera.  i then took the photo.  then i picked up my binocs and looked at the "stat" again.  the item was brightly colored with red/blue.  but i wasn't concerned!!!  i only thought about the coating on the lenses and the possible effects it would have on the image.  maybe i missed a great opportunity.  now i think i did because i have the 8" telescope and tripods for cameras to record this item.  i think i blew it.

i picked up the camera and shot additional frames of the sky for test purposes, but i didn't shoot at the image.  my intent was to experiment with the camera and lens to actually be able to take a photo of a ufo.

i cam back into the house and continued to get ready for my trip to town.  i looked up and the item was still in the same place.  but, nothing unusual because it seemed very distant.

i made my errand and didn't think much about the "star".  

last night (jan30) i began to think about other reports and colors mentioned.  so this morning i looked at the frame again.  

in the image you can see the diagonal light which indicates movement of the camera for .30 sec.  around the frame you will see other diagonal items (stars) which verify the movement.  my camera is very heavy for this kind of freehand attempt.

the original image was shot in canon raw (.Cr2).  this image is about 20meg in size so a smaller version is uploaded.

download it, blow it up 800% and go figure!  i'm not claiming it to be unidentifiable (ufo).  i sure has the colors others have mentioned.  

this is the second report i have submitted in 10 years.  

occurred : 8/23/2000 02:17 (entered as : 08/23/00 0217pst)
reported: 8/24/2000 13:39
posted: 3/21/2003
location: vail, az
shape: flash
duration:5 sec
content.summary: See photo - red/blue lights

content.detailedDescription: I'd say i was about 16 or 17 when i saw them. me and 2 friends were on our was to boardman from new middletown to go to the subway to get food when we saw what looked like 2 headlights in the air next to a radio tower on call road. we thought well thats kinda weird. as we drove by we noticed it was a shiny silver greyish triangle shaped craft with lights at the points. we drove past and it just kinda hovered there like it didnt notice. it was so close to the radio tower that it was almost against it. awww stuck we decided to drive by again a few times. the last time we drove back toward it being young and dumb i sped up and went into the oppsite lane heading toward it. when i seemed to notice that we knew it was there and we trying to get its attention. the craft started weaving and bobbing eradically in the air in a zigzag pattern and began to rise. when we turned around again the craft to of across the sky faster than anything i guarantee manmade could go. hitting the horizon in a matter of seconds. so after our fun messing with the ufo we decided to finally go eat. not really knowing what to think about what we saw. when we left the subway heading back to new middletown we could see another wet of lights above the cornfield in the initial area of the radio towers. we also noticed that there were about 30 people in the gas station parking lot sittin on their hoods and next to their cars watching the object hover in the air. it was at that point you really know your not nuts and other people see what you do. when we tried to get closer to it after leaving the gas station it moved away from the roads this time. these sightings when on for at least 3 days. no one really said anything on the radio or tv but tons of people saw them. even i skywatcher i know saw serveral of them over cities all over the area. finally after about 3 days the black silent helicopters started showing up. flying around with no lights on. the only way i even knew they were there was because you could see their outlines in the light from the nearby city. we also saw a very big craft fly over boardman in the night time. it was huge. like another sighting i read about it was the size of a shopping mall and silent. there were alot of weird things in the sly after that. large fireballs honestly it looked like the back of a star destroyer from star wars. like a row of big firey engines. those could have been fire baloons i guess after all the hype someone probably thought hey would play a joke or it was attempt to cover up the other ufo's. but i will say i get chills up my back still from thinking about this. haha, all my house lights are on now. it's scary. and even the old timer that lived by the towers said they show up once in a while. when i told him about them he said " there back again" they show up about ever 10 years or so hover around and then the go away again. so i still have my eyes in the sky waiting for them to come back. besides how many chances do you get to chase a ufo with your car.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo's all over that night with lights at each point

content.detailedDescription: sat after thanksksgiv about 5;30 pm .Thought it was a hellicop in trouble.Spinning out of control. it was coming right for us and then turned to our right .I ran inside and grabbed binocs. therewas abrite orange globe above it. kind of a beam too . the three orbs moved fasy to thesouth and 5 jet s slowly swooped down onthem. wethought they were going to hit one .They were as big as the jets and then took offto the sn.We were changingthe brakes on my friends truckand i noticed ared light in the sky.Threegun metal balls with bigred lights ,spinning in a slinky motion .No helicopter.We counted fivbe jets zoomm down on them , one almost hit them or it?Thenit was gone . there was astrange orange globe above that went straight up and dissappered
content.summary: Multiple  orbs w/ large red eyes spinning in a sslinky formtion -jets too                               1

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside my apartment waiting on my girlfriend to get home and looked to the west sky.  i noticed a very bright star changing colors. it kept my attention.  there were other celestial objects in the picture, planets, and probaly a star. there were even planes in the area. i live down the street from the airport and i have all my life, so i'm used to seeing aircraft of all kind.  this was different.  it was just like a star flickering different colors, frm white, red and blue. at first it seemed as though it wasn't moving, then it shifted directions going south then moving closer toward my direction.  i immediately ran upstairs to tell my neighbor to witness the event.  he came out and seen the same thing i seen.  we witnessed a triangular craft with lights on all three corners and one in the middle.  the light in the middle appeared a lite blue.  the triangular craft was flying with the two bottom angles moving foward and the  one angle on the back. each corner had a light with the one on the back glowing red.  the front two on each corner were white.  it flew over with no noise at a normal speed.  i could clearly see the triangular shape of the craft as it flew over. the object flew to the east and we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Looked like a star at first. it changed colors often. very bright!  it eventually got closer and went overhead as a triangle shaped  craft with lights on every angle and one in the middle
